long_description: Providing cool coverage for desert treks or any hot-weather hiking, the Sunday Afternoons Traveler Hat includes a sun cape so it shields your face and neck from the sun without weighing you down. Nylon fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly; polyester mesh side panels enhance ventilation; 5.5 in. sun cape covers your neck. Fabric features UPF 50+ sun protection. Internal polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes; dark underbrim reduces glare. Clamshell brim ensures that the Sunday Afternoons Traveler hat packs down small. Adjustable chin strap keeps the hat secure in windy conditions.
short_description: Providing cool coverage for desert treks or any hot-weather hiking, the Sunday Afternoons Traveler Hat includes a sun cape so it shields your face and neck from the sun without weighing you down.
